LanguageData.AEXP_EggDesertTortoiseUnfertilized.label: desert tortoise egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.AEXP_EggDesertTortoiseUnfertilized.descr: An unfertilized desert tortoise egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.AEXP_EggDesertTortoiseFertilized.label: desert tortoise egg (fert.)
LanguageData.AEXP_EggDesertTortoiseFertilized.descrip: A fertilized desert tortoise egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby desert tortoise. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.AEXP_EggGilaMonsterUnfertilized.label: gila monster egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.AEXP_EggGilaMonsterUnfertilized.descript: An unfertilized desert gila monster egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.AEXP_EggGilaMonsterFertilized.label: gila monster egg (fert.)
LanguageData.AEXP_EggGilaMonsterFertilized.descriptio: A fertilized gila monster egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby gila monster. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
